item.title: Now Renting Two Bedrooms at One32
item.address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M5A 0H6
item.description: Address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M5A 0H6 Toronto - 132 Berkeley Street Toronto <br /> <br /> Phone: 416.639.1105 <br /> Bedrooms: 2 Bedrooms <br /> Available: Now Available <br /> Community Amenities: Laundry Facility, Storage Lockers Available, Fitness Room, Patio with BBQ, Bicycle Parking, Library, Board Room, Terrace, In-suite Laundry <br /> <br /> Description: <br />Located near Queen and Berkeley, at the edge of historic Corktown, One32 is the ideal home for students and urbanites looking to live in a vibrant and eclectic neighbourhood. Find independent boutiques, unique shops and historical buildings just outside your door. From One32, you're only a few minutes to the downtown core, George Brown College King campus, historic Distillery District and St. Lawrence neighbourhood. For anywhere else you need to go, the TTC is just steps away. One32’s studio to 3 bedroom homes feature stylish interiors with bright open floor plans, vinyl plank flooring throughout main living areas and dishwashers. One bedroom suites over 480 square feet as well as all two and three bedroom homes also feature in suite laundry. Environmental sustainability was kept top of mind in the development of this project. One32 will target the Toronto Green Standards (Tier 2) in addition to LEED Gold certification. Offering quality construction, top-notch amenities and our signature Concert On-Call service, One32 is the ideal choice for living your low maintenance, urban lifestyle. One32 has ranked in the top 15% for resident experience in professionally-managed rental properties across Canada based on a survey conducted by JD Power. To book an appointment with our resident services team, click here. <br /> <br /> The Concert Difference <br />We believe that when you rent an apartment, you need to know that everything works, and everything will continue to work as long as you continue to live there. And if something isn't working properly? Welcome to peace of mind, where we handle every concern in a timely manner.And for those urgent situations? Our maintenance service is there for you 24-7-365.Our guarantee is that we will be available, ensuring that you have everything in your home working properly, so that enjoyment of your Concert rental home is your only concern. <br /> <br /> Video: <br />http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tw2gZG6xnIc

item.title: Apt for rent in " Le Seville " luxury building in montreal
item.address: 1414 Rue Chomedey, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3H 0A2
item.description: Address: 1414 Rue Chomedey, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3H 0A2 I am offering my 1 bedroom apartment for rent for July and August. <br /> <br />The building is one of the most facilitating buildings in montreal. It is located in Atwater station, Downtown montreal. So you're basically close to all the action and in the same time you have some privacy. <br /> <br />First of all, the apt is located in seville building, which is a project of 3 towers connected together from the inside. Every tower has a rooftop with a pool and barbeque grills + there is a playroom on the 2nd floor of tower 3 " which is the one my apt is in " , a chalet for chilling on the 21st floor and an 8th floor terrace that has more grills. <br /> <br />The building is on top of supermarket " Adonis " which one of the most well known supermarkets in montreal and it is connected to it from the inside. Also, the building has one of the most well equipped gyms in montreal, with a spa inside that contains 2 jaccuzis , 1 sauna room, 1 steam room and an outdoor heated pool. <br /> <br />My apartment is a corner unit, so you can't get noise complaints + you have a nice view. It is a one bedroom apartment, and there's a sofa in the living room that can sleep 1 person, and I have an extra mattress available upon request. So the apartment can fit around 2-3 people. <br /> <br />I am currently paying $1640 for this apartment totally unfurnished + I'm paying electricity, TV cable and Internet. <br /> <br />I am out of town for july and august and I'm looking for someone to take my apartment for these 2 months. You will pay $1600 per month which is less than my actual rent PLUS you will get all the furniture, TV, Bose sound system and I will pay electricity, Internet and TV cable services. PLUS there will be a $750 security deposit fee for the furniture that I will give you back as soon as you leave the apartment and a $100 cleaning fee. <br /> <br />Please note that I couldn't upload more than 10 images and I will be willing to send you more pics and discuss more details with you on the phone or in person. <br /> <br />My cellphone: +1 514 652 9616

Throughout this quiet community, apartments are offered inclusive with newer appliances, beautiful upgrades and the option of in-suite laundry or on-site laundry facilities. Also here you can enjoy the indoor heated pool, a gym, private work out areas, an indoor racquetball court and sauna rooms. Also at this location is ample is indoor and outdoor parking with extra storage areas. Close by you are convenient to all amenities, bus routes, the hospital and easy access to the expressway.</p><p>To confirm a viewing, please email us at info@panoramicproperties.ca with the best phone# to reach you at, so we may confirm in person, or call us directly at (416) 209-6133.</p><p>Prices are listed as from, due to renovations that may be done to a unit once it becomes vacant. item.title: Beautiful 1 BR condo in Spruce Cliff, S.W.
item.address: 24 Hemlock Crescent SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T3C 2Z1
item.description: Address: 24 Hemlock Crescent SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T3C 2Z1 Lovely, bright and open, renovated 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo for rent. Located just off Bow Trail in Copperwood Estates which is on the Shaganappi Golf Course and walking distance to the Westbrook LRT station and to the bike trails. If you'd rather drive, the commute to the core is approximately 10 mins! <br /> <br />This beautiful 750 square foot condo is located on the 5th floor in a concrete building. It is safe and secure. The layout of the unit is well-designed with little wasted space and it was renovated in 2014. Renovations included new paint, flooring, light fixtures and updated gas fireplace facade. The unit also has a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances (fridge, dishwasher, oven, microwave), corian countertops and glass backsplash tile. There is an oversized, 4-piece cheater bathroom (accessed via the foyer and the bedroom), a bedroom which fits a queen bed and 2 closets, 9' celiings with remote control ceiling fans in the bedroom and living room. The unit comes complete with in-suite laundry, balcony with gas line, assigned undergound parking stall and storage locker. <br /> <br />Tons of amenities including, full gym, party room, meeting room, car wash bay, wood shop and secured bicycle room. Guest suite available. Rent includes water. Electricity extra (runs approx. $35/month). Non-smoking, no pets. <br /> <br />Negotiable availability for a 12 month term.

item.title: LUXURY – Gorgeous 34th Floor Penthouse With Stunning Views
item.address: 210 15 Avenue SE, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2G 0B5
item.description: Address: 210 15 Avenue SE, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2G 0B5 This Prestigious 34th floor Penthouse is the ideal home for the person or couple who deserves it all. Who wants to be, do and have the Extra in Extra Ordinary. Who believes that you only live once and who wants to make it the absolute best it can be. Who wants to create an experience that very few have the opportunity to do - to live in a PENTHOUSE! <br /> <br />The OUTSTANDING RIVER, MOUNTAIN AND CITY VIEWS from every room and window in this Penthouse are spectacular... You Decide How You Start And End The Day. <br /> <br />Admire the majestic Rocky Mountains to the south west, the calming Elbow River to the south, the world famous Stampede Park to the east and the ever changing downtown skyline which serves as your background to the north. Stunning sunrises and sunsets from this executive perch are simply divine. An added benefit is the bird’s eye view you have of the celebrated Calgary Stampede annual fireworks display in July. <br /> <br />This two-storey, 2100 sq. ft., south west corner PENTHOUSE is the best positioned condo in one of Calgary’s urban residential towers called Vetro, located in the heart of downtown Calgary. <br /> <br />The modern design and open floor plan of this exclusive air-conditioned suite provides a level of comfort, luxury living and entertainment space that is rarely available in any rental suite. <br /> <br />Porcelain tile and mirrored closet doors set off the front entry foyer which then flows into the uniquely designed open kitchen. Granite countertops, an extended breakfast bar, dark chocolate full height flat panel kitchen cabinets, premium fixtures and designer backsplash unite to produce a modern open kitchen ideal for cooking the most extravagant of meals, having a beautifully catered event or simply entertaining family and friends. <br /> <br />The Stainless Steel appliance package includes a 23 cubic foot side-by-side refrigerator to easily accommodate the most discerning of ‘foodies’, with water and ice maker for your convenience. Also included is a ceran top self-cleaning convection oven, a 5 cycle ultra-quiet dishwasher and an OTR microwave, everything you need to make life that much easier. <br /> <br />This well-designed kitchen opens to both the living room and dining room and is surrounded by an impressive expanse of 9 ft. floor to ceiling windows – wrap yourself in the never ending stream of natural light while you ground yourself in the breath taking views...a level of relaxation that is hard to find this day and age. <br /> <br />Stay indoors and enjoy this impeccable sanctuary as much as you like...but I can promise you’ll fall in love with your private, oversized south west facing (RockyMountainvi

item.description: Address: 433 Edison Avenue, Winnipeg, MB, Canada, R2G 0M3 Hey guys, <br /> <br />I have a 2 bedroom apartment that I've been at since September 2013 but looking to downsize to a 1 bedroom because a 2 bedroom just isn't needed for me anymore. <br /> <br />The suite is normally over $1000, but due to the former property management not handling things properly and there being some damage, we were given the option of moving down a floor onto the second floor to a brand new renovated suite which had things done correctly. I jumped at the opportunity. <br /> <br />Upon approval, I will give you $300 cash that you can use towards whatever you need. <br /> <br />Features: <br /> <br />- Brand new renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, chocolate coloured cabinets <br />- Hardwood floors in living room <br />- Dishwasher <br />- Only utilities you are responsible for is Hydro (normally $30-60 a month) Cable, Phone. <br />- Air conditioning <br />- First apartment on the 2nd floor closest to Parking Lot, makes it really easy for groceries, moving in, etc. You're about 6-8 steps away from the back door. <br />- Friendly neighbours, great landlord that lives on the 3rd floor (Stacy -- he's awesome), <br />- 7-11, Bus routes across the street and schools, Macs minutes away <br />- 8-10 minute walk from Henderson <br />- 2 Bedrooms, both closets have full length mirrors <br />- Brand new exercise room with bike, new tread mill, new elliptical <br />- Laundry very conveniently on the same floor <br /> <br />There's a sublet fee of $75.00 which I will pay. item.title: Yaletown Furnished 1 bd 1 bath condo - available Sept 1st
item.address: 1088 Richards Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 3E1
item.description: Address: 1088 Richards Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 3E1 This spectacular one bedroom one bath condo unit is located in the heart of Yaletown. It is close to amenities such as the yaletown-roundhouse canada line stop, sushi and thai restaurants, a dog park, yaletown seawall, Roundhouse Community Center, soccer park, library, and various coffee shops. This is a perfect place for a Masters student, a working professional, a young couple, or someone who is moving to Vancouver and needs to rent a furnished place. This is a central location for public transportation commuters to hop on the Canada Line to connect to bus routes at Olympic Village, King Edward, and Oakridge Centre. <br /> <br />The Richards Living is a modern condo development built by Aquilini Developments. The building is 4 years old with modern interior look and a brownstone exterior mixed with green landscaping. It truly has a natural Westcoast feel. The condo is fully furnished with a classic modern look and it has been acclaimed by Vancouver Magazine as one of the best places to stay. All the previous tenants were thrilled as it met their expectations for quality and comfort. <br /> <br />The condo is furnished with a queen size bed, dining table, double wardrobe storage unit, wooden hangers, leather couch, Samsung smart tv, LED lighting, and coffee table. In-suite washer and dryer in bathroom. A storage room is available to store suitcases and items. Additional wardrobe cabinet with wooden hangers and shoe pull out for extra shoes and clothing storage. The modern kitchen has fridge, stove and oven, dishwasher, auto-shut drawers, and European modern flat cabinets. <br /> <br />Daily basics such as plates, glasses, towels, ironing board, iron, microwave, toaster, cutting board, and laundry basket are included in the rent. The kitchen comes fully stocked with essentials if you plan to cook and stay in. Intercom is used for food deliveries. <br /> <br />The building includes a gym (open: 6am to 11pm daily), a garden terrace or reading area, a car wash bay, recycling and garbage room, bike storage rooms, and rear pick up area. A private or personalized display can be set up on the front and rear entrance intercoms of the building for local mobiles (604 or 778). <br /> <br />Rent of $1850 does not include cable, phone, and utilities. Tenant needs to set this up under their own account. Owner covers hot water use in the unit. Parking is additional and available as a single stall in a secured underground parkade. <br /> <br />If you are interested in making an appointment to view the suite, please email Sophia at sophia.fu2@gmail.com. It is available for move-in on Sept 1st for a one year lease. A minimum one year lease is required.

With extra high ceilings, original electric fireplaces, and wainscoting the personality flows. item.description: Address: 550 Cottonwood Avenue, Coquitlam, BC, Canada, V3J 2S1 Coquitlam - 550 Cottonwood Ave Coquitlam <br /> <br /> Phone: 604.939.0944 <br /> Bedrooms: 2 Bedrooms <br /> Available: Jul 1 <br /> Community Amenities: Laundry Facility, Pool <br /> <br /> Description: <br />Whitgift Gardens is situated on an eight-acre site in West Coquitlam within close proximity to transit, schools, shopping and numerous parks. Every apartment has a balcony and comes with a parking space. Whitgift Gardens is located adjacent to Cottonwood Park within easy walking distance to the Burquitlam Plaza neighbourhood shopping centre. The community is also within walking distance of both Mountain View and Roy Stibbs Elementary Schools. Lougheed Town Centre, hiking or biking on Burnaby Mountain, Simon Fraser University and the Millennium Skytrain Line are also nearby. <br /> <br /> Amenities: <br />Three centrally-located laundry facilities, equipped with SmartCard technology, make doing laundry easy and convenient. Concert's professional on-site staff maintains the building premises and grounds, and is dedicated to making your Concert living experience a pleasant one. Our site office is open 12pm to 5pm Monday to Saturday for your convenience, with on-call service after hours to respond to your emergency needs. <br /> <br /> The Concert Difference <br />We believe that when you rent an apartment, you need to know that everything works, and everything will continue to work as long as you continue to live there. item.title: LUXURY – Gorgeous 34th Floor Penthouse With Stunning Views
item.address: 210 15 Avenue SE, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2G 0B5
item.description: Address: 210 15 Avenue SE, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2G 0B5 This Prestigious 34th floor Penthouse is the ideal home for the person or couple who deserves it all. Who wants to be, do and have the Extra in Extra Ordinary. Who believes that you only live once and who wants to make it the absolute best it can be. Who wants to create an experience that very few have the opportunity to do - to live in a PENTHOUSE! <br /> <br />The OUTSTANDING RIVER, MOUNTAIN AND CITY VIEWS from every room and window in this Penthouse are spectacular... An added benefit is the bird’s eye view you have of the celebrated Calgary Stampede annual fireworks display in July. <br /> <br />This two-storey, 2100 sq. ft., south west corner PENTHOUSE is the best positioned condo in one of Calgary’s urban residential towers called Vetro, located in the heart of downtown Calgary. <br /> <br />The modern design and open floor plan of this exclusive air-conditioned suite provides a level of comfort, luxury living and entertainment space that is rarely available in any rental suite. <br /> <br />Porcelain tile and mirrored closet doors set off the front entry foyer which then flows into the uniquely designed open kitchen. item.description: Address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M5P 2X7 Apartment for Rent in Toronto<br/><br/>Key Property Details<br/>Luxury Rental Apartments in a Fantastic Location!Fitness Facilities, Sauna, & Indoor Pool!Relax in elegant living spaces, including guest suites!<br/>Property Features<br/>Air ConditioningBalconyCable ReadyConciergeElevatorFitness CenterOn Site ManagementParty Room PetsPoolSauna<br/>Detailed Property Information<br/>Nestled in the heart of affluent Forest Hill in Toronto, your home at 400 Walmer Road has everything you could ask for in a luxury rental apartment – a fantastic location, beautiful landscaping and impeccable service. <br> <br> 400 Walmer Road is surrounded by all of the comforts and conveniences you’d expect when living at a premier address. Unwind in our lush, serene grounds complete with water fountains or catch up with family and friends on the terrace by the pool. You are also steps from the TTC and Forest Hill Village with its quaint cafés, restaurants and gourmet shopping. It’s everything you need to make living easy at one of the top rental apartment buildings in Toronto, and it’s all yours to discover at 400 Walmer Road. <br> <br> Our premier suites for rent boast the finest finishes such as beautiful hardwood floors, newly remodeled kitchens and bathrooms, climate control with air conditioning and private balconies to enjoy beautiful views of the city. We also offer guest suites for those times your friends or family come to visit. <br> <br> Indulge in our collection of amenities offering you convenience and comfort. From the time you come home to 400 Walmer Road, our Concierge is there to greet you and our on site team are there to ensure they make living easy for you. <br> <br> Relax and unwind in our fitness facilities, sauna and indoor pool with skylights. Or finish off that novel in the comfort of our newly renovated library/social room. There is also a terrace by the pool, where you can catch up with friends and family or enjoy a barbeque dinner on a nice summer evening. Recreational programs are available as well for our residents including aqua fit, pilates and yoga. <br> <br> Need to host a party or prepare for that big night out? We have the perfect room to host your event, so go ahead and invite your guests. If you need to get that dress or tuxedo dry cleaned or get your hair done to prepare, we have an on-site dry cleaner and hair salon, so you can look your best. And if you run out of soft drinks, our on-site convenience store has what you need. <br><br> <br/><br/><br/>Additional Property Information<br/>SurveillanceDoorman/Concierge DeskSpacious suites with beautiful hardwood floorsEnjoy remodeled kitchens and bathroomsRelax in elegant living spaces, including guest suitesTake in the view from private balconiesL

item.title: Montgomery Mills - 24 Mabelle Ave. - 3 Bedroom Apartment for...
item.address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M9A 4X8
item.description: Address: Toronto, ON, Canada, M9A 4X8 <p><br />These Condo style suites at 24 Mabelle Ave. are conveniently located on the Bloor subway line only a few minutes walk from the Islington subway station. This is a great neighbourhood with lots to offer residents. It's close to the Islington Village shopping district which has a great choice of shops and restaurants. There are also elementary, mid and high schools in the neighbourhood. There are many parks in the area including Mimico Creek Park with exceptional recreational facilities. This area of Islingon has a mixture of single family homes and more recently many apartment, condo and commercial towers on Bloor St. The Bloor / Islington area is perfect if you enjoy an active lifestyle and only 20 minutes from downtown Toronto on the subway.</p><p> This is a very clean, bright and welcoming building. Each suite is freshly painted with newly finished hardwood floors throughout and air conditioning. This building has superior facilities, such as a gym, indoor pool, sauna, party room and games room. It also has controlled access, underground parking, and laundry facilities. Conveniently located in the building is a dry cleaners and beauty salon. The grocery store is just across the street from this building. So whether you drive or not most amenities are within walking distance including a pharmacy and many shops and restaurants. <br /> </p><p><br /> </p><br />Location Details<br /><p>This area which is considered Islington Village dates back to the 1800's. Thomas Montgomery's Inn was a major stagecoach stop in the early 1800's and this community was named Islington after the hometown of his wife in England. The Montgomery Inn is now a Museum and open to the public to enjoy afternoon tea and it also hosts many other functions.</p><p><br /> </p><p><br /> </p><br />Utilities Included:<br />HeatWaterElectricity

item.description: Address: 1916 McCallum Road, Abbotsford, BC, Canada, V2S 3M8 <p>Wellesley Manor Apartments provides exceptional apartment living in a friendly environment. Our 3-story apartment building boasts well maintained grounds, spacious suites and a secure entrance. There are smart card laundry facilities within the building as well as storage lockers for all residents. Ample parking is also available. Our suites are complete with fridge, stove and window coverings, and you can relax out on your very own balcony. Some suites also feature laminate flooring. </p><p>Wellesley Manor is located close to Highway 1 and the McCallum Road interchange, with public transit conveniently located nearby. item.title: New Suites, picturesque views, great lifestyle and value
item.address: 2160 Paliswood Road SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2V 4S5
item.description: Address: 2160 Paliswood Road SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2V 4S5 <p>New 1 and 2 bedroom suites with modern features combine with the serenity of the Glenmore Park Reservoir and Heritage Park community to promote a lifestyle alternative to downtown living.   Elata at Glenmore Gardens is the good life, on your terms.</p><p> </p><p>Key Property Details – Settle for everything…</p>New Suites with Modern Features!In-suite laundry and air conditioning!Elata is a Non-Smoking BuildingOpen- Air BalconiesFitness CenterParking ($125)Party/Social RoomPet FriendlyIndoor Pool<p> </p><p> </p><p>Vertica Resident Services Elata is a new rental residence located in one of the most tranquil and picturesque areas in Calgary, along the Glenmore Reservoir. Conveniently located in Southwest Calgary at 2160 Palliser Drive SW, near the intersections of 19th Street SW, and 90th Avenue SW.<br /> <br /> Suites are now available for rent in this relaxed setting with units overlooking the water. Live within a stone's throw of the water and enjoy the meandering pathways surrounded by nature. <br /> <br /> Elata at Glenmore Gardens offers resort-style living in the city. Enjoy the heated indoor pool, the fitness centre and lush ten-acre gardens within steps of outdoor activities. Venture out for a walk or hike along the water with friends or a leisurely bike ride on the endless paved pathways and trails. <br /> <br /> Summertime offers opportunities to sail, kayak, boat, and canoe. Wintertime is its own wonderland with cross-country skiing, snowshoeing and a great excuse to warm your hands with a hot mug at one of the local coffee shops. Or just stick close to home and get to know your neighbours. </p><p> </p><p>Call us at 403-279-0696    Or visit us at vertica.ca</p><p> </p><p>Experience the Vertica Difference</p>Customer Service, Cleanliness, Convenience and Community… it’s our Commitment.

item.title: 2 Bedroom Large On The Hill Uptown (July 1) - Dog & Cat Friendly
item.address: 65 Greenfields Drive, Fredericton, NB, Canada, E3B 5L9
item.description: Address: 65 Greenfields Drive, Fredericton, NB, Canada, E3B 5L9 ▪️This Large 2 Bedroom apartment is located on the hill Uptown at 65 Greenfields Drive. It is available for July 1st, 2015. This apartment is child friendly. It is on the ground floor at the front of the building facing Greenfields Drive, and the Jubilee Super Buffet Chinese Restaurant. $780<br /><br />▪️You can include your heat, hot water, and lights for only $190. Honestly, it is cheaper to go unheated, unlighted with no hot water included.<br /><br />▪️The apartment has new white colonial doors all throughout the apartment. It has 2 medium size bedrooms with a large double closet in each. The apartment has a full size bathroom with a bathtub and shower. It has a linen closet inside the bathroom for convenience. The kitchen comes with a frost-free fridge and a stove. There is a range hood over the stove vented to the outside in case you burn anything. All of the kitchen cabinets received new oak doors. There is room for a table with chairs in the dining room area. The dining room, and part of the hallway has laminated floors. There is a half wall between the dining room and the full size living room which gives you an open concept. There is a walk-in storage room inside the apartment. It comes with your own 40 Gallon hot water tank made for a family of 4. You have complete control of your heat. There is a thermostat in each room. There are electrical outlets all throughout the apartment for all of your electronics.<br /><br />▪️65 Greenfields Drive is a 2 and a half storey, 24 unit apartment building with 8 apartments on each of its 3 levels. This brick security building with an intercom system is well built. It has concrete walls in between the apartments from side to side and in the main hallways for soundproofing and fire protection. There is lots of paved parking. There is a small backyard with a blue picnic table. There is a bus stop next door beside the Jubilee Super Buffet Chinese Restaurant, and a covered bus stop in front of Twin Acres two buildings over. The snow removal, and the lawn care maintenance are included.<br /><br />▪️The coin-operated Laundry Room has a passcode lock for security. It is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for your convenience. It has 3 GE commercial washers and 3 GE commercial dryers at a $1.50 each. There is a full size pop machine, and a vending machine from Boyd's Vending Ltd. located in the hallway on the ground floor. The pop machine has a wide selection of pop including Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, Coke, 7Up, Mountain Dew, Mug Root Beer, and Orange Crush. The vending machine has a good selection of chips including Humpty Dumpty Cheese Sticks, Lay's Classic Chips, Old Dutch BBQ Chips, Hostess Original Hickory Sticks, Humpty Dum

item.description: Address: 433 Rue Sainte-Hélène, Montreal, QC, Canada, H2Y 2K9 Situé sur la prestigieuse rue Sainte-Hélène, ce loft du Vieux-Montréal est parfait pour des gens moderne et dynamique! <br /> <br />Bordée de 3 grandes fenêtres, la pièce est très vaste et lumineuse, elle est surtout parfaitement agencé puisque l'espace chambre est dans un den distinct de l'espace de vie. Par ailleurs, chaque meuble a été selectionné avec goût, les matériaux sont de qualité et la grande cuisine donne sur le salon. <br /> <br />Vous disposerez aussi d'une belle terrasse sur le toit, profitant ainsi du soleil et de la vue sur le Vieux-Montréal! <br /> <br />Immeuble très paisible et silencieux. Les reglements de la copropriété sont assez stricts sur le bruit afin de maintenir une atmosphère sécuritaire et paisible pour les résidents. Vous profiterez donc d'un environnement silencieux au milieu d'un des quartiers les plus dynamiques de Montreal. <br /> <br />Emplacement: <br />433 rue Sainte-Hélène, Vieux Montréal, H2Y 2K9 <br />Le loft est parfaitement situé à mi-chemin entre la Station Square Victoria et la Promenade du Vieux Port (5min à pied). <br />Vous vivrez entourés de petites boutiques et de restaurants gastronomiques dans un quartier pavé de charme et d'histoire. <br />Transports : Station Square Victoria, Bus (61, 75, 36, 28, 168), accès rapide à l'autoroute Bonaventure. <br /> <br /> <br />Inclus : <br />-Appareils ménagers : Frigo, cuisinière et four, lave-vaisselle, laveuse/sécheuse <br />-Meubles : Canapé en cuir, table à manger, lit queen, tiroirs, lit simple, linge de maison, ustensiles de cuisine, télé LCD <br />- Possibilité d'avoir les utilitaires inclus pour un montant supplémentaire. <br /> <br />Bail de 12 mois, renouvelable.

item.title: Beautiful 4 1/2 available June 22 (for July 1st)
item.address: Montreal, QC, Canada, H3W 2H5
item.description: Address: Montreal, QC, Canada, H3W 2H5 This is a beautiful, bright and very spacious 2-bedroom apartment in a quiet building that has access on both Cote-St-Luc and Bonavista. The apartment is 1400 sq.ft and features two large bedrooms (each could fit a queen or king sized bed), 9ft ceilings and an incredible view of the city. The open concept layout includes a very large living room and a separate dining area. There is a lot of storage including two walk-in closets. There are hardwood floors and recessed lighting throughout. The building is well maintained and many of the apartment's windows are new. <br /> <br />The Westmount-adjacent building is located less than a ten-minute walk from both Snowdon and Villa Maria metro stations. The location is also very handy to get downtown as the 66 bus runs right past the front door, taking you to the Guy-Concordia metro in under 15 minutes. The building is also walking distance to Monkland Village, which features grocery stores, banks, cafés, pharmacy, and trendy bars and restaurants -- basically everything you need! <br /> <br />The apartment includes all kitchen appliances (fridge, gas stove, microwave, dishwasher). The building features a laundry room for all tenants on the second floor. Heating and hot water are included in the rent. Additional utilities (gas and electricity) are paid by the tenant and the expense is minimal. <br /> <br />The building also features an incredible rooftop terrace open to all tenants. The view of the city and the sunset is amazing! The terrace has tables and BBQs that tenants are welcome to use. There is also a workout room for tenants that has a variety of machines. <br /> <br />Parking is available if necessary for $100 per month for indoor parking and $50 for outdoor. (You would need to discuss this with the landlord, as I do not have a car.) <br /> <br />For lease transfer on July 1st but you can move in as early as June 22nd. The lease is up August 31st, with the option to renew with the landlord. <br /> <br />Additional information: I really love this apartment. The building is quiet and the other tenants are really friendly. It is in a safe neighbourhood and the landlord and super are great. I am moving in with my girlfriend and we decided to look for our first place together. <br /> <br />Recap: Heat and hot water included. Kitchen appliances included. Laundry in the building. Close to two metro stations and Monkland Village. Huge rooms and a great view. Parking available. And the building is pet friendly. <br /> <br />----------- <br /> <br />Voici un appartement de 2 chambres beau, lumineux et très spacieux dans un immeuble calme qui peut être accès par Côte-St-Luc ou Bonavista. L'appartement est 1400

item.title: $2500 Bright, spacious apartment on 2 floors 2-3 bedrooms
item.address: 222 Brock Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M6K 2L9
item.description: Address: 222 Brock Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M6K 2L9 *** Please note- rent includes all utilities. *** AVAILABLE IMMEDIATELY *** <br /> <br />Huge spacious bright and sunny apartment on the second and third floor of a large house for rent (as one unit). <br /> <br />It is currently configured as 2 large bedrooms on the second floor and one very large open concept space on the third floor. <br /> <br />It's a great, bright apartment with character and high ceilings. <br /> <br />You have your own main floor entrance through the front door, and the porch is yours if you like to sit out. <br /> <br />On the second floor is the washroom, kitchen and the 2 bedrooms (could become 3). The picture with the light blue walls is the smaller of the bedrooms. The other bedroom is a double sized room with 2 doors, 2 closets and 2 windows. This huge bedroom could be divided into two decent sized bedrooms if you needed that. <br /> <br />The picture with the dog and the green rug is part of the kitchen. There is a new counter top and a fresh paint job on the cupboards. There is room for a small table to make it an eat-in kitchen. (The current occupant made it a kind of music lounge area.) <br /> <br />On the third floor is a large open room and a fabulous deck. The current occupant is using it as a recording studio but previous tenants have used it as a bedroom and living room when there used to be a wall dividing it. The built in bed/lounge area wasn't built when the larger picture was taken, but that is a super cozy feature! <br /> <br />Great area close to parks, rec center, Dufferin Mall, Dundas/Ossington/Queen nightlife, schools, rink, pool, playgrounds and splashpad. Great restaurants and coffee shops on Dundas. Great community and neighours. <br /> <br />Sorry- no laundry or dedicated parking space. There are 2 laundromats about 3 minutes away on Dundas. Street parking is available by permit. (I use street parking myself and usually find a spot right on the block in front of the house or just a few houses down. It's never presented a problem.) <br /> <br />Main floor is occupied by the owner, her son and 2 small dogs. <br />We are looking for a compatible tenant - families with kids are welcome, pets are welcome. <br /> <br />I just want responsible tenants that work with our lifestyle (ie. quiet at night for the most part, no smoking in the house, easy to get along with, pays rent on time...) We are really easy to get along with, and having friends over and that kind of stuff is fine (I mean I had a musician up there!) but if you are a total party animal, neither of us would be happy. :) <br /> <br /> <br />Please get in touch by email with questions and to book an appointment to view.

item.title: 1 bedroom apartment in Osborne Village - available July 1st
item.address: 270 Roslyn Road, Winnipeg, MB, Canada, R3L 0H3
item.description: Address: 270 Roslyn Road, Winnipeg, MB, Canada, R3L 0H3 The apartment is a spacious 800 sq. feet with 1 bedroom and fantastic view of the Assinboine River from the large balcony. The bedroom is 12 x 11 sq. ft. with a large closet. There is also a large storage closet within the apartment. Rent includes heat, water, central air, and electricity. Tenants pay for cable and internet. Laundry rooms are found on each floor. This is fantastic location, close to downtown, and a 5 minute walk from a Safeway and the heart of Osborne Village. We also have two parking spots available at a cost of $34.00/month.

item.title: PLATEAU SHERBROOKE des ERABLES , ÉTAGE SUPÉRIEUR CLAIRTRANQUILLE

item.description: Address: 2171 Rue Sherbrooke Est, Montreal, QC, Canada, H2K 1C8 Grand 4 ½, ÉTAGE SUPÉRIEUR TRANQUILLE, <br />Très clair et ensoleillé. Grande fenêtres dans toutes les pièces. <br />Cuisine récente. Lave-vaisselle neuf. Entrée laveuse-sécheuse. <br />1 seule chambre à coucher fermée. <br />Idéal pour couple, pour travailleur autonome ou célibataire. <br />État impeccable, Boiseries, Portes intérieures et Planchers en chêne dans toutes les pièces. Vestiaire intérieur et garde-robes éclairés. <br />Thermostats programmables pour l’économie et le confort. <br />Balcon privé à l’avant et un autre mitoyen à l’arrière donnant sur une église (calme et ensoleillé). <br />Cabanon extérieur individuel. <br />Bien entretenu par le propriétaire. <br />Transport rapide et efficace ( bus 24 vers Metro Sherbrooke) partout au centre-ville. <br />La rue Mont-Royal ou l'Hôpital Notre-Dame en 5 minutes à pied <br />Immeuble non-fumeur. Pas de chien. <br /> <br />TEL: 514-983-5820 <br /> <br />Spacious 4 ½. QUIET UPPER FLOOR. <br />Bright and well lit. Large windows in all rooms. <br />Modern kitchen. New Dishwasher. Washer/dryer connections. <br />Only one closed bedroom. Ideal for couple, single – freelance. <br />Oak floors, doors and moldings throughout. <br />Closets with interior lighting. <br />Heating by programmable electronic thermostats for comfort and economy. <br />Private balcony in front, a large one shared in the back overlooking a church. (quiet and sunny). <br />Private outside locker. <br />Building well maintained by owners. <br />Quick and efficient transport (Bus 24-Sherbrooke to Metro or downtown. <br />Mt-Royal St or Notre-Dame hospital: 5 minutes’ walk. <br />Non-smoking building – No dogs. <br />TEL: 514-983-5820
